item.title: 4 things you must know on R
item.description: Author: Sandesh Sharma Installing Packages and Libraries Libraries are the things that make R so powerful. It is the heart for all processes that take place in R studio. CRAN (The Comprehensive R Archive Network) has more than 10,000 packages[1]. I think libraries/packages in R are like pre-built function that can be used by anyone, so they do not have to write the code from bottom up. Some of the famous libraries-that you may have heard, are ‘tidyverse’, ‘caret’, ‘ggplot’ etc.
